title: VIDEO: The Silk Road Cargo Race
content:
If you recall, last year Belen posted a Silk Road Mountain Race Reportage here on The Radavist that featured Allan Shaw finishing the grueling event on an Omnium Cargo Bike. In this video we get a look at what transpired during that feat…

“Allan Shaw recounts his awe-inspiring experience in the 2023 Silk Road Mountain Race, a 1880 km ultra distance cycling race through the mountains of Kyrgyzstan. He navigates the terrain as the first person to attempt the race on an Omnium V3 cargo bike, showcasing the bike’s incredible versatility.

This documentary captures the highs and lows of the race, from conquering the formidable Kegeti Pass to enduring a challenging fall that tests Allan’s resilience. Witness the mental and physical strength required to persevere through to the end, as Allan reflects on the race.

An unforgettable adventure, exploring not only the rugged landscapes but also the logistics and adaptability needed for such a demanding endeavor. Allan’s story is a testament to the indomitable spirit of human determination.”
